details.title: Special offer just for you!
details.text:
You get 25GB Dropbox space included in your Vodafone plan for free!

Just sign up here and complete the Dropbox Get Started guide to activate.

*25GB Dropbox space available for 36 months

checkbox.label: I accept terms and conditions
checkbox.errorMessage: Please accept the terms and conditions
checkbox.confirmationMessage: By selecting to subscribe now you will activate the free 25GB free Dropbox offer.

accordion.label: Offer details
accordion.text:
Get Started

When you accept your offer you will receive 3GB of bonus Dropbox space. In order to get your full 25GB you need to complete 5 steps in the Dropbox Get Started guide at www.dropbox.com/gs

Additional space

The space given is on top of any current Dropbox space you may already have.

Internet charges

You'll pay our standard data charges to use this service when you're roaming or when you've exceeded your data allowance.

Stopping the offer

This offer last for 36 months from the date of activation. You can unsubscribe from the offer any time via the My Offer page in your Backup+ app.

success.title: Congratulations!
success.text:
We have started you off with 3GB of additional space in your Dropbox account!

Don’t forget, you need to complete the Dropbox Get Started guide to unlock your full 25GB offer.

Already completed the Dropbox Get Started guide?

You now have 25GB additional Dropbox space.

details.title: Your Offer
details.text:
You’ve got 25GB of Dropbox space included in your Vodafone plan

Don’t forget to complete Dropbox Get Started guide to activate your full offer.

Promo terms apply

accordion.label: Offer Details
accordion.text:
Get Started

When you accept your offer you will receive 3GB of bonus Dropbox space. In order to get your full 25GB you need to complete 5 steps in the Dropbox Get Started guide at www.dropbox.com/gs

Additional space

The space given is on top of any current Dropbox space you may already have.

Internet charges

You'll pay our standard data charges to use this service when you're roaming or when you've exceeded your data allowance.

Stopping the offer

This offer last for 36 months from the date of activation. You can unsubscribe from the offer any time via the My Offer page in your Backup+ app.

details2.title: Unsubscribe from your offer
details2.text:
By ending your offer you will lose your bonus 25GB of Dropbox space.

You will still be able to use Backup+ for syncing your contacts and backing up to Dropbox as long as you have enough Dropbox space.

Are you sure you want to unsubscribe?
